metadata.title: CVE-2019-5463 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An authorization issue was discovered in the GitLab CE/EE CI badge imagesendpoint which could result in disclosure of the build status. Thisvulnerability was addressed in 12.1.2, 12.0.4, and 11.11.6.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
